CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP : PC71BM blend |
| PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |
| PC71BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP : PC71BM blend |
| PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend |
| PC71BM |

The other entities in the paragraph, such as "fibril width" and "phase-separated morphology," do not refer to specific material names and should not be included in the table.
